translated: The Questions of King Milinda
The Questions of Opammakathā
The Matrix

original: “Bhante nāgasena, katihaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu arahattaṁ sacchikarotī”ti?🔽“Idha, mahārāja, arahattaṁ sacchikātukāmena bhikkhunā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena kati haṅgehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu arahattam sacchikaroti iti  idha mahā rāja arahattam sacchikātu kāmena bhikkhunā
translated: “Venerable Nāgasena, endowed with how many qualities does a monk realize arahatship?”
“Here, sire, a monk who desires to realize arahatship should take up one quality of the ass,
five qualities of the cock,🔽one quality of the heron,

original: Kalandakassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.🔽Dīpiniyā ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: kalandakassa ekam aṅgam  dīpiniyāḥ ekam aṅgam
translated: one quality of the lamp,
two qualities of the torch,
five qualities of the tortoise,🔽one quality of the bamboo,

original: Vaṁsassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.🔽Cāpassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.🔽Vāyasassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: vasassa ekam aṅgam  cāpassa ekam aṅgam  vāyasassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: one quality of the arrow,🔽two qualities of the bird,
two qualities of the monkey.
The first sub-chapter on the ass is finished.
One quality should be taken up from the timidity of the deer,
three qualities should be taken up from the lotus,
two qualities should be taken up from the seed,
one quality should be taken up from the good Sālakaliṅga woman.

original: Nāvāya tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Nāvālagganakassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: nāvāya tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni  nāvālagganakassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: Three things should be taken from a boat.🔽Two things should be taken from the captain of a boat.
One thing should be taken from a well.
Three things should be taken from a dam.
One thing should be taken from a worker.
Five things should be taken from the ocean.

analyzed: samudda vaggaḥ dutiyaḥ  pathaviyā pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: The second sub-chapter on the ocean is finished.🔽Five things should be taken from the earth.

original: Āpassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Tejassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Vāyussa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: āpassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni  tejassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni  vāyussa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: Five things should be taken from water.🔽Five things should be taken from fire.🔽Five things should be taken from air.

original: Pabbatassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Ākāsassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: pabbatassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni  ākāsassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: Five things should be taken from a mountain.🔽Five things should be taken from space.
Five things should be taken from the moon.
Seven things should be taken from the sun.
Three things should be taken from Sakka.
Four things should be taken from a wheel-turning monarch.

analyzed: pathavī vaggo tatiyaḥ  upacikāya ekam aṅgam
translated: The third sub-chapter on the earth is finished.🔽One thing should be taken from a spider.
Two things should be taken from a cat.
You should take up one quality from the mongoose.

original: Vicchikassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.🔽Nakulassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: vicchikassa ekam aṅgam  nakulassa ekam aṅgam
translated: You should take up one quality from the scorpion.🔽You should take up one quality from the mongoose.
You should take up two qualities from the old jackal.
You should take up three qualities from the deer.
You should take up four qualities from the ox.
You should take up two qualities from the boar.
You should take up five qualities from the elephant.
The fourth sub-chapter on the house lizard is finished.
You should take up seven qualities from the lion.
You should take up three qualities from the ruddy goose.
You should take up two qualities from the partridge.
You should take up one quality from the house dove.

original: Ulūkassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Satapattassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ulūkassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  sata pattassa ekam aṅgam
translated: You should take up two qualities from the owl.🔽You should take up one quality from the butterfly.

original: Vaggulissa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Jalūkāya ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.🔽Sappassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: vaggulissa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  jalūkāya ekam aṅgam  sappassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: You should take up two qualities from the leech.🔽You should take up one quality from the snake.🔽You should take up three qualities from the cobra.
You should take up one quality from the lion.
The fifth sub-chapter on the lion is finished.
One quality of the forest monkey should be adopted.

original: Thanasitadārakassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.🔽Cittakadharakummassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: thanasita dārakassa ekam aṅgam  cittaka dhara kummassa ekam aṅgam
translated: One quality of the young bull elephant should be adopted.🔽One quality of the tortoise should be adopted.
Five qualities of the wind should be adopted.
Three qualities of the tree should be adopted.
Five qualities of the cloud should be adopted.
Three qualities of the gem should be adopted.

original: Māgavikassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Bāḷisikassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: māgavikassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbāni  bāḷisikassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: Four qualities of the deer should be adopted.🔽Two qualities of the fisherman should be adopted.
Two qualities of the bee should be adopted.

analyzed: makkaṭa vaggaḥ chaṭṭhaḥ  kumbhassa ekam aṅgam
translated: The sixth sub-chapter on the monkey is finished.🔽One quality of the pot should be adopted.

original: Kāḷāyasassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Chattassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: kāḷāyasassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  chattassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: Two qualities of the black snake should be adopted.🔽Three qualities of the umbrella should be adopted.
Three qualities of the field should be adopted.
Two qualities of the antidote should be adopted.
Three qualities of the food should be adopted.
Four qualities of the archer should be adopted.
The seventh sub-chapter on the pot is finished.
Four factors should be taken from a king.

original: Dovārikassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Nisadāya ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.🔽Padīpassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: dovārikassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  nisadāya ekam aṅgam  padīpassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: Two factors should be taken from a doorkeeper.🔽One factor should be taken from a seat.🔽Two factors should be taken from a lamp.

original: Mayūrassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Turaṅgassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Soṇḍikassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: mayūrassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  turaṅgassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  soṇḍikassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: Two factors should be taken from a peacock.🔽Two factors should be taken from a horse.🔽Two factors should be taken from a hook.

original: Indakhīlassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Tulāya ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.🔽Khaggassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: indakhīlassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  tulāya ekam aṅgam  khaggassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: Two factors should be taken from a yoke-pin.🔽One factor should be taken from a scale.🔽Two factors should be taken from a razor.

original: Macchassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Iṇaggāhakassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.🔽Byādhitassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: macchassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  iṇaggāhakassa ekam aṅgam  byādhitassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: Two factors should be taken from a fish.🔽One factor should be taken from a debtor.🔽Two factors should be taken from a sick person.
Two factors should be taken from a dead person.

original: Nadiyā dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Usabhassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: nadiyāḥ dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  usabhassa ekam aṅgam
translated: Two factors should be taken from a river.🔽One factor should be taken from a bull.

original: Maggassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Suṅkasāyikassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: maggassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  suṅkasāyikassa ekam aṅgam
translated: Two factors should be taken from a path.🔽One factor should be taken from a hen.
Three factors should be taken from a thief.
One factor should be taken from a bird-catcher.
You should adopt one quality from a dog.
You should adopt three qualities from a doctor.

original: Gabbhiniyā dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Camariyā ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: gabbhiniyāḥ dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  camariyāḥ ekam aṅgam
translated: You should adopt two qualities from a pregnant woman.🔽You should adopt one quality from a female slave.
You should adopt two qualities from a crow.
You should adopt three qualities from a hen.
You should adopt two qualities from a one-eyed person.

original: Kassakassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Jambukasiṅgāliyā ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: kassakassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni  jambuka siṅgāliyāḥ ekam aṅgam
translated: You should adopt three qualities from a farmer.🔽You should adopt one quality from a mango or a rose-apple tree.

original: Caṅgavārakassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Dabbiyā ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.🔽Iṇasādhakassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: caṅga vārakassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  dabbiyāḥ ekam aṅgam  iṇa sādhakassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: You should adopt two qualities from a ferryman.🔽You should adopt one quality from a debtor.

original: Anuvicinakassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.🔽Sārathissa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.
analyzed: anuvicinakassa ekam aṅgam  sārathissa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni
translated: You should adopt one quality from an investigator.🔽You should adopt two qualities from a charioteer.

original: Bhojakassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni.🔽Tunnavāyassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: bhojakassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbāni  tunnavāyassa ekam aṅgam
translated: You should adopt two qualities from a householder.🔽You should adopt one quality from a weaver.
You should adopt one quality from a boatman.
You should adopt two qualities from a bee.”
The lists are finished.
